00009 class BoolImpl extends DatumImpl implements Bool {
00010     private boolean value;
00011 
00012     BoolImpl(PureFactory factory, boolean value) {
00013         super(factory);
00014         this.value = value;
00015     }
00016 
00017     public boolean booleanValue() {
00018         return value;
00019     }
00020 
00021     public Bool not() {
00022         return factory.makeBool(!value);
00023     }
00024 
00025     public Empty equals(Data data) throws Exceptional {
00026         if (data instanceof Bool)
00027             if (value == ((Bool)data).booleanValue())
00028                 return factory.makeEmpty();
00029         throw new Exceptional(factory.makeEmpty());
00030     }
00031
